ygData.subject: RE: Hey this sounded interesting..
ygData.msgSnippet: ... They are not hybrids, they are the priest classes.  I do not know where this notion came from that the cleric/druid/shamen class are hybrids.  The hybrid
ygData.messageBody:
>From: "Kimes, Dean W." <Dean_Kimes@...>
>Reply-To: eqbards@onelist.com
>To: "'eqbards@onelist.com'" <eqbards@onelist.com>
>Subject: RE: [eqbards] Hey this sounded interesting..
>Date: Thu, 30 Sep 1999 12:56:40 -0600
>
>From: "Kimes, Dean W." <Dean_Kimes@...>
>
>Not valid, cleric/druids/shamans are as much of hybrids as we are and can
>all bind. Verant doesn't acknowledge this but I think it is pretty clearly
>true.

They are not hybrids, they are the priest classes. I do not know where this
notion came from that the cleric/druid/shamen class are hybrids. The hybrid
classes are Ranger (Warrior/Druid), Paladin (Warrior/Cleric), Shadow Knight
(Warrior/Necromancer), and Bard (Rogue?/Enchanter?/?).
